title.text: Security Update For Exchange Server 2016 CU13 (KB4509409)

description.text:
The security update addresses 3 vulnerabilities:
An information disclosure vulnerability exists when Microsoft Exchange Server allows creation of entities with Display Names having non-printable characters.
An elevation of privilege vulnerability when an attacker executes a man-in-the-middle attack to forward an authentication request to Microsoft Exchange Server.
A cross-site-scripting (XSS) vulnerability exists when Microsoft Exchange Server does not properly sanitize a specially crafted web request to an affected Microsoft Exchange Server.
